taky-chess.name: Taky Chess
taky-chess.description: Online multiplayer chess game made with Next.js and web sockets using Pusher.js and Redis.

type-fusion.name: Type Fusion
type-fusion.description: a web application that tests typing speed and accuracy while giving an overview about typing performance, the app also features a simple leaderboard that lists the top ten users based on the score of their latest performed test.

tetris.name: Tetris
tetris.description: The popular game of Tetris recreated in the browser using vanilla JS (typescript), mobile support included.
